title: Playing MF with the new ult on PBE <3
body:
She's a huge threat now, that AoE presence is back and stronger than ever come late game. 

I can't wait to see the visual effects they're gonna add to her ult. I'm salivating. <3

replies.body:
honestly, she's just outright broken on PBE, adding another 3.2ad to her already powerfull ult is a bit to much.
I reached 2400 damage with fullgear+baron, **not** inclouding her W stacks...

Her ult wasn't already powerful. It kind of sucked. The stupid amounts of damage in the rest of the kit carried the ultimate. Now, the ultimate is actually worth a damn, and it will probably make her too strong.

> [{quoted}](name=Don Pavoni,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1MAGc3cL,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-09-18T12:46:43.457+0000)
>
> honestly, she's just outright broken on PBE, adding another 3.2ad to her already powerfull ult is a bit to much.
> I reached 2400 damage with fullgear+baron, **not** inclouding her W stacks...

Thats the point. If you stand in all 8 waves of bullet time, you SHOULD be punished with death. I mean, she has to stand still for 2 seconds to channel that spell. Before it didn't do anything lategame but stack impure shots. Now it actually does AoE hell. 

I doubt she will reach god tier in solo q. With her frail self, lack of escape, and team fighting ult, she needs a team built for her.

2 sec with 1400 range and rather wide aoe...i don't find it that hard to pull her ult off without beeing in a risky spot...

by that logic,zyras ult should deal the damage again with the knockup, cause if you stand 2 sec on vegitation, you deserve to die
Velkoz would deserve a atleast 1.5 ap ratio rather than the 0.6 he got on his...
Nunu's ult should deal 100%maxhealth truedamage, cause comone, you need to stay next to him for 3 sec straight...

mf ult on life already deals good damage, it migh need a small buff, but 3.2 ad is far over the top.
1000damage+2.17 total ad on a full ult(vs 0 stacks targets) is quite nice, especially if you consider that her W will be fully stacked on multiple targets, so you have heavy damage once you come to cleanup, maybe half the ad-ratio from pbe would do it, though probably still a bit to strong.

I'd prefer buffs to her W and maybe passive over raw dmage on the ult.
like changeing the W-passive damage to 5-7%(so 56% instead 48% on max stacks, 2.52%total ad for ult) scaleing with W rank and increase the stack duration with ult ranks, so you have a bigger window to use the stacks after ult.
maybe up the ms on her passive lategame and let it instantly activate after your ult, so you can capitalize on the ult more efficiently.

This way, mf would still gain far more out off her ult, but would actually have to do something other than press R.

On PBE, you just wait for enemies to run into a choke point or eats aoe cc, then press R and enjoy a tripple-penta kill...

> 
> I doubt she will reach god tier in solo q. With her frail self, lack of escape, and team fighting ult, she needs a team built for her.

No you shouldn't be punished with an ace because Amumu and MF ulted.
Yeah, the AD scaling is long overdue.

additional AD scaling*

It always scaled with AD (unless you didn't rank W, then you were probably going to lose anyways.)

> [{quoted}](name=Marthian,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1MAGc3cL,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-09-18T03:02:37.989+0000)
> 
> It always scaled with AD (unless you didn't rank W, then you were probably going to lose anyways.)

1: W AD scaling doesn't scale with rank at all

2: the thing people were complaining about, was the lack of AD scaling on the physical part of the ult (aka the one that benefits from armor penetration)

No one gives a shit if the magical part got AD scaling: it will still deal no kind of damage post 15 minutes
If you didn't  rank w AT ALL, is what i am talking about.

I can't wait to see how she does in competitive. She might make picks like Amumu/Sej more common again.

If they remove these buffs though... I just won't play her til the ult rework.

>She might make picks like Amumu/Sej more common again.

That might explain why Sej didn't get compensated for her double nerf >.>

Or at least it satisfies us now. She's definitely going to be a great combo with MF (ult for stun, and then an aoe slow for sticking power!).
